'''Gregory Ellis''' (born [[21 March|March 21]], [[1968]]) is a British screen and voice actor. His most iconic screen roles are that of Michael Amador, the virus broker, in the third season of ''[[wikipedia:24 (TV series)|24]]'', and Chief Engineer Olson in [[wikipedia:Star Trek (2009 film)|Star Trek'']]. 

==Roles==
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - "[[Net Mender]]"
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'' - Additional voices
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - Additional voices
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' - Additional voices

==Quotes==
{{quote|I have lost my voice so many times voicing these games - like Medal Of Honour, Call Of Duty and even games like Lord Of The Rings as it's impossible for me to voice a character at half the intensity.|Greg Ellis, [http://www.mi6.co.uk/sections/articles/interview_greg_ellis.php3 Interview]}}
